mapper.update: update base_resource set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PID = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATH = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=TINYINT}, DES = #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_ROUTE = #{menuRoute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREAT_USER = #{creatUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREAT_DATE = #{creatDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, NAME, TYPE, CODE, PID, PATH, SORT, DES, MENU_ROUTE, CREAT_USER, CREAT_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE from base_resource where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, NAME, TYPE, CODE, PID, PATH, SORT, DES, MENU_ROUTE, CREAT_USER, CREAT_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE from base_resource
